alphabeticThreeCharCode.description: The alphabetic three-character code that represents a the country, e.g., “DEU” for Germany.
alphabeticThreeCharCode.title: IsoCountryCode.alphabeticThreeCharCode Schema

description.description: A brief description of the country.
description.title: IsoCountryCode.description Schema

identifier.description: The alphabetic two-character code that represents a country.
identifier.title: IsoCountryCode.identifier Schema

name.description: The short name of the country as listed in ISO 3166, inherited from Locale.
name.title: IsoCountryCode.name Schema

numericCode.description: The numeric three-digit code that represents the country, e.g., “276” for Germany and “008” for Albania. Note that this number may have leading zeros and is therefore represented by a string.
numericCode.title: IsoCountryCode.numericCode Schema

officialName.description: The official name of the country as listed in ISO 3166, e.g., "Federal Republic of Germany".
officialName.title: IsoCountryCode.officialName Schema
